Flow.description: 6/20 - AV - Added an extra condition to the "Filter exposure after 1974" to account for "Null". 6/12 - AV - Fixed some filter criteria in "Additional Cause Details" so that the DQ's would work. 6/11- AV - Fixed state DQs. They needed to be "Less than" instead of "Greater than" in order to properly trigger. 6/11 - AV - Fixed typo in twoyearsago formula. Currently, it was subtracting 2 days instead of 2 years. 6/11 - AV - Fixed TN exposure CQC. 6/11 - AV - Fixed a misspelling in the over 20 years turn down details assignment. 6/11 - AV - Added null check because CQC was going on the wrong routing for date of dx, and moved age check to be after so that it doesn't trigger before the date of birth is filled out. 6/10 - AV - There was an extra filter needed on the "Living or Dead" so that if it's a "Self" case it won't DQ me for death DQs. And, added a null check for IP date of death. Added some more "Null" checks for living DQs. 6/11 - AV - Fixed remission formula to use new fields, as it was still referencing the old ones, causing the CQC not to work.
Flow.label: SRLG | Questionnaire | Round Up | CQC
